summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating the installation, alteration, repair, maintenance and operation of refrigeration systems; providing for certain licenses and permits, specifying qualifications, requiring certain examinations and payment of fees, creating and Advisory Committee, prescribing penalties, and repealing Ordinance No. 80153, as amended by Ordinance Nos. 80254, 80756, 81478, 81502, 82198, 82721 and 82758.
